snippet: The charges against Graham B. Spanier, which include perjury, come as authorities examine how Penn State officials handled allegations of child sexual abuse involving Jerry Sandusky.
abstract: Former Penn State president Graham B Spanier, as well as university officials Gary Schultz and Tim Curley, are charged in Jerry Sandusky child sex abuse case; face charges that include perjury, obstruction of justice, endangering the welfare of children and criminal conspiracy for their handling of allegations against Sandusky.
lead_paragraph: The charges against Graham B. Spanier, which include perjury, come as authorities examine how Penn State officials handled allegations of child sexual abuse involving Jerry Sandusky.

headline.seo: Graham B. Spanier, Former Penn State President, Charged in Sandusky Case
headline.main: Former Penn State President Is Charged in Sandusky Case
headline.print_headline: Former Penn State President Is Charged in Sandusky Case
